      char[] checkScreen(int movieID)
      Receives the seating availability information of a particular movie from the screen table of the database, given by movie ID as a character array, where N indicates not booked and Y indicates booked.

    • Method Detail

      • checkScreen

        public char[] checkScreen(int movieID)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Receives the seating availability information of a particular movie from the screen table of the database, given by movie ID as a character array, where N indicates not booked and Y indicates booked.
        Parameters:
        movieID - the movie ID
        Returns:
        the seating availability character array
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • updateScreen

        public void updateScreen(int movieID,
                         char[] seating)
        Updates the seating availability information of a particular movie given by movie ID, in the screen table of the database.
        Parameters:
        movieID - the movie ID
        seating - character array containing N or Y for not booked or booked

      • updateMovie

        public void updateMovie(int movieID,
                        int availableSeats)
        Updates the number of seats available of a particular movie given by movie ID, in the movies table of the database.
        Parameters:
        movieID - the movie ID
        availableSeats - the new number of available seats

      • addBooking

        public void addBooking(int ID,
                       int movieID,
                       java.lang.String seats)
        Adds the booking information a customer has made into the bookings table of the database.
        Parameters:
        ID - the ID associated with a customer
        movieID - the movie ID
        seats - the seats a customer has booked
